Sentence: Because the T c value of Nb within the MgB 2 wire is 9.2 K, the I c values of the joints of the multifilament MgB 2 wires were measured at 10, 15, and 20 K with the following steps: (1) the MgB joint sample installed on the current leads of the probe was cooled to the set temperature (10, 15, or 20 K) by a vapor cooling method using the boiloff of LHe; (2) the V -I curve for the test sample was obtained to determine the I c value of the sample; and (3) the I c values of the joint samples were deter- mined using 1 ÂµV/cm criterion.
In recent years, the magnesium diboride (MgB 2 ) super- conductor has emerged as one of the most viable alternatives to existing MRI magnets using LTS at low magnetic fields below 4-5 T.

Because the T c value of Nb within the MgB 2 wire is 9.2 K, the I c values of the joints of the multifilament MgB 2 wires were measured at 10, 15, and 20 K with the following steps: (1) the MgB joint sample installed on the current leads of the probe was cooled to the set temperature (10, 15, or 20 K) by a vapor cooling method using the boiloff of LHe; (2) the V -I curve for the test sample was obtained to determine the I c value of the sample; and (3) the I c values of the joint samples were deter- mined using 1 ÂµV/cm criterion.
